## Suggested tools

Testing out a table layout for common office tools. A variation on the resources page.

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
library(kableExtra)
library(janitor)


all <- data.frame(

    "https://gsuite.google.com/marketplace/app/trello_for_gmail/710372432947",
```
